name: Umbral (Ignacio Puccini)
description:
UMBRAL

Umbral is a minimalist First Person Puzzle game in which the player is trapped in a black & white labyrinth. Those two colours generate a "flat figure" effect that makes impossible to understand the 3D environment unless the player moves.

It's a prototype made in 2015.

Credits:
- Tomás Batista: Game Design, Music and SFX
- Ignacio Puccini: Game Design and programming
- Mauro Del Gaudio: Technical Artist
